All Implemented Interfaces:
CoAPConstants, PlugAndPlayable, coap.RequestHandler, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.Observer
public class JavaScriptApp
extends AbstractApp
implements CoAPConstants

JavaScriptApp executes apps written in JavaScript using Rhino.

Author:
Martin Lanter
